alert.note: Alert for Anderson; Central Greenville; Greater Pickens; Southern Greenville (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 21 at 5:28PM EST by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT GREENVILLE...NORTHEASTERN ANDERSON AND EASTERN PICKENS COUNTIES THROUGH 615 PM EST... At 528 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles north of Pickens to near Easley to 4 miles north of Anderson. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Greenville Downtown, Anderson, Easley, Pickens, Greenville Eastside, West Greenville, Greer, Mauldin, Taylors, and Simpsonville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Anderson; Central Greenville; Greater Pickens; Southern Greenville
